summary: Assign or unassign device group for patch compliance
description: Assigns and unassigns a device group for a patch compliance.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Describes the clientId or mspId of the tenant

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: System defined action for patch baselining

parameters.name: resourceGrpId
parameters.description: Unique Identifier (UUID) of the resource group
